architecture_decisions: ZENITH v5.2.0 uses three-pillar persistence: memory (zenith-memory.json), memory-manifest (memory-manifest.json), learnings-manifest (learnings-manifest.json)
All manifests auto-persist to GitHub on POST and load from GitHub on cold start
Self-healing health endpoint at /api/health checks all three pillars
operational_learnings: Render free tier spins down after 15 min inactivity â€” first request may take 30-60s
Always include existing env vars when PUT-ing Render env vars (replaces all)

self_healing_log.details: Health check found categories: null, loadStatus: unknown. Rebuilt manifest with proper structure and re-posted to restore pillar.
